paragraphs.text: Lily was an Earth Kingdom nomad and musician who shared many similarities with her husband, Chong.
Lily quickly became friends with Katara.

paragraphs.body: Before meeting her future husband, Lily became a musician and learned to play the flute; her musical talents were the first attribute to which Chong, who used to serenade her with his banjo, felt attracted. After they both formed a nomadic group, they traveled around the world while playing songs and telling stories with their friends.

paragraphs.body: Lily ventured further through the caves with Sokka and the rest of the nomads. After about an hour of aimlessly walking through the ever shifting tunnels, they had another run in with wolfbats, but this time, the vicious animals were trying to get away from two ${link_0}. paragraphs.body: Lily was airheaded but always optimistic. She was a laid back, free-spirited person who preferred to enjoy life rather than obsess over the details. Mild-mannered and at times almost lethargic, she did not always pay attention to the most obvious things. Lily was never nonplussed like the rest of her nomadic friends. She had gentle disposition: mild, friendly, warm with a kindly gentleness.
